description: We have a beautiful studio with amazing views in the heart of downtown Manhattan. Only a 4 minute walk to the Freedom Tower, Wall Street, ferries to the Statue of Liberty and Battery Park. A 10 minute walk to the historic South Street Seaport. Great access to public transport; 4,5,W,R,1,2,3,Path, Staten Island Ferry all within a 6 minute walk!
name: Luxury Highrise Apartment With Amazing Views!
